title: Avast Anti-Virues Block LoL Installer
body: Avast Anti-Virus is blocking the download of the OCE League of Legends Installer as it specifies it as a Win32 Evo Gen, a suspicious files. Is there a reason for this? Or is this of Avast's fault with a improper detection database? It will block the initial download but if I click "Retry" in Google Chrome the download can proceed with no hitches. I scanned the applicaiton after and nothing is detected.

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is more than likely a false positive by Avast as has happened many times in the past.
